de.berlin.magun.nfcmime.core
Class CrcGenerator

java.lang.Object
  de.berlin.magun.nfcmime.core.CrcGenerator

public class CrcGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods to generate and verify checksums for NdefRecord arrays.

Author:
Johannes Bolz

checkHash

public boolean checkHash(NdefRecord[] records,
                         long checksum)
Checks if the CRC32 checksum of a NdefRecord[] array matches a reference checksum

Parameters:
records - NdefRecord[] to check against checksum
checksum - long representation of a CRC32 reference checksum
Returns:
true if the CRC32 checksum of records matches checksum.
